channel.title: Please!help me with my portfowarding
channel.description:
is this right?i have quest actiontec pk5000 router
1. Enter the LAN port and IP information.
Starting Port: 43594 Ending Port: 43594 Protocol: TCP LAN IP Address: 97.120.15.31
2. Enter the remote port and IP information. (Optional)
Starting Port: 0 Ending Port: 65535 Set Remote IP Address: 0.0.0.0
then i click apply, is that right?because when i click apply, it comes up with "IP Address and LAN IP are not in the same subnet. "

item.title: Please!help me with my portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @supermimez supermimez
item.description:
@supermimez wrote:

is this right?i have quest actiontec pk5000 router

  1. Enter the LAN port and IP information.

Starting Port: 43594
Ending Port: 43594
Protocol: TCP
LAN IP Address: 97.120.15.31

  1. Enter the remote port and IP information. (Optional)

Starting Port: 0
Ending Port: 65535
Set Remote IP Address: 0.0.0.0

then i click apply, is that right?because when i click apply, it comes up with "IP Address and LAN IP are not in the same subnet. "
